Source.Name: perl-getopt-long
Source.Summary: Getopt::Long - Extended processing of command line options
Source.Description: The Getopt::Long module implements an extended getopt function called GetOptions(). It parses the command line from @ARGV, recognizing and removing specified options and their possible values.

Package.Name: perl-getopt-long
Package.Summary: Getopt::Long - Extended processing of command line options
Package.Description: The Getopt::Long module implements an extended getopt function called GetOptions(). It parses the command line from @ARGV, recognizing and removing specified options and their possible values.
